Summary: usual size, black & white, red & blue lighs underneath
divs: Sighting Details I was at my job, working as security guard, I was sitting down when I looked up at about a 45 degree angle and somewhat to my left. It looked like there was something was wrong with the picture. There were two lights behind the tree branch in front of me. The lights were like on a police car only they were up in the sky. Noticing this I stood up and walked left away from the trees to get a better view. What I saw was at first I thought was the size of a small airplane. In retrospect, It seemed it was the the size of a stadium at least. It was rectangular the sides were wider than the rest. The middle was black and the rest was white. It looked amber because of the city lights. The running lights were under the belly but I did not see what attached them to the ship. I saw it glide west to east then make a mild turn to its right for a couple thousand yards and then head east until I lost sight of it. At first I felt I felt good that I had seen it, but after a few seconds I felt like I be put away somewhere or wisked away to to some secret location. So I talked to a contact I know and was made to feel more confident. Then I soon got on a computer to report.
